section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the install.

section.title: Software Prerequisites
section.para: The Remote SLEE Connection Tool is a JCA connector, thus it requires a Java EE platform to run it.

section.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; Remote SLEE Connection Tool Source Code

step.title: Downloading the source code

important.para: Subversion is used to manage its source code. Instructions for using Subversion, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use SVN to checkout a specific release source, the base URL is http://mobicents.googlecode.com/svn/tags/servers/jain-slee/2.x.y/tools/remote-slee-connection, then add the specific release version, lets consider &THIS.VERSION;.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.0.9 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the deployable unit binary.

Once the process finishes you should have the JCA mobicents-slee-remote-connection.rar directory artifact in the target/mobicents-slee-remote-connection.rar-beans directory. Deploying the JCA connector depends on the Java EE platform used, in case of &JEE.PLATFORM; simply copy the directory artifact to the platform's deploy directory.

section.title: Development Trunk Source Building
section.para: Similar process as for , the only change is the SVN source code URL, which is http://mobicents.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/servers/jain-slee/tools/remote-slee-connection.

section.title: Installing &THIS.PLATFORM; Remote SLEE Connection Tool
section.para: To install the tool to the &JEE.PLATFORM; simply copy the provided mobicents-slee-remote-connection.rar directory into the deploy directory of the target server profile.
For other Java EE platforms please refer to its documentation on how to deploy the JCA connector.

section.title: Uninstalling &THIS.PLATFORM; Remote SLEE Connection Tool
section.para: To uninstall the tool from the &JEE.PLATFORM; simply delete the mobicents-slee-remote-connection.rar directory from the deploy directory of the target server profile.
For other Java EE platforms please refer to its documentation on how to undeploy the JCA connector.
